column5: Nestled on 29 acres, Sister Grove Farm offers a family-friendly farm experience. Located 20 minutes from McKinney, we provide the best of a country experience, yet it’s close to restaurants, parks, and activities. You’ll love Sister Grove for its peaceful sitting areas and scenic views. Wake up to farm fresh eggs, hayrides, and strolls among the sheep and cows in our pastures. Our farm is well equipped for all ages from babies to older couples. This is a great place for a weekend get-away!
column8: Sister Grove Farm Country Get-Away, Yellow Room
